https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/behav._instruction: Add all behavioral protocols that were performed during this session.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/behav.label: Behavioral protocol
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/behav.name: behavioralProtocol

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/contr._instruction: Add the contrast agent used for this scan.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/contr.label: Contrast agent
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/contr.name: contrastAgent

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/delay._instruction: Enter the duration from trigger delivery to scan onset (only the first volum).
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/delay.label: Delay after trigger
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/delay.name: delayAfterTrigger

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/delay._instruction: Enter the arbitrary delay time set by user before each volume acquisition.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/delay.label: Delay time
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/delay.name: delayTime

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/devic._instruction: Add the MRI machine setting used for this scan.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/devic.description: Piece of equipment or mechanism (hardware) designed to serve a special purpose or perform a special function.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/devic.label: Device
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/devic.name: device

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/field._instruction: Add the images or field maps used for correction of inhemogenties in B0 field of this aquisition.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/field.label: Field map
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/field.name: fieldMap

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/input._instruction: Add the state of the subject or tissue sample before this session.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/input.description: Something or someone that is put into or participates in a process or machine.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/input.label: Input
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/input.name: input

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/numbe._instruction: Enter number of volumes discarded by user before the first volume.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/numbe.label: Number of volumes discarded by user
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/numbe.name: numberOfVolumesDiscardedByUser

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/repet._instruction: Enter the echo time of this aquisition (TR).
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/repet.label: Repetition time
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/repet.name: repetitionTime

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/sbref._instruction: Add the single-band reference image for this volume.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/sbref.label: Sbref
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/sbref.name: sbref

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/speci._instruction: Add the anatomical orientation of the specimen in the scanner.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/speci.label: Specimen orientation
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/speci.name: specimenOrientation

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/struc._instruction: Add the structural MRI relavent for this aquisition.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/struc.label: Structural mri
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/struc.name: structuralMRI

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/volum._instruction: Enter aquisition times of each vloume.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/volum.label: Volume timing
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/volum.name: volumeTiming
